amendment.description: Amendment requires that the shelters constructed under the bill may not be made available exclusively for the use of the residents of a particular manufactured housing park or of other manufactured housing, but shall generally serve the residents of the area in which it is located.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add text stipulating that a shelter assisted with amounts made available in the bill may not be made available exclusively for use of the residents of a particular manufactured housing park or of other manufactured housing, but shall generally serve the residents of the area in which it is located.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaFalce amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
